descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**Our discord:** xlabdigital.com/discord

󠁪

# Join the fight for humanity’s survival in IRON GUARD: Salvation - a thrilling Tower Defense with strategy elements. Build defenses, upgrade turrets, and repel relentless robot waves with your handheld drone. Only your tactical brilliance can save humanity across battles on various planets including the hostile world of Acris.
󠁪
[media]

󠁪

⚔️ **Fast-paced gameplay** – enemies adapt to each battle. Choose your difficulty and how to play: oversee from above or manually fire from your drone.

󠁪

🪐 **30 hand-crafted levels** across many planets – each with new obstacles and strategic opportunities.

󠁪

✨ **Multiple modes and mechanics**. Play in different styles, adapt each run, and climb the leaderboard.

󠁪

🤖 **Formidable foes** – distinct enemy tactics test your skills. Carefully choose and combine turrets, and make full use of battlefield opportunities.

󠁪

💎 **Upgrades and resource management** – level up turrets and drone; use harvesters, minerals, and factories for a steady resource flow.

󠁪

👨‍🚀 **Command heroes** – control Graves, Irina, and Mitchell, each with unique abilities that can shift the tide of battle.

󠁪

🌍 **Tactical control** – command from above, or shrink into the action and immerse yourself in a giant’s world of turrets and machines.

󠁪

💣 **Arsenal of possibilities** – choose from 25+ turrets, move platforms to adapt defenses, deploy superweapons, and more.
